name: pipe2jpeg
description: Parse individual jpegs from an ffmpeg pipe when output codec is set to mjpeg and format is set to image2pipe, singlejpeg, mjpeg, or mpjeg.

scripts.test: node tests/test1.js && node tests/test2.js && node tests/test3.js && node tests/test4.js && node tests/test5.js && node tests/test6.js
scripts.doc: jsdoc index.js -d docs && git commit -m "update docs" -- docs

author: Kevin Godell <kevin.godell@gmail.com>
